ARABIC: فَأَنجَيْنَٰهُ وَأَهْلَهُۥٓ إِلَّا ٱمْرَأَتَهُۥ كَانَتْ مِنَ ٱلْغَٰبِرِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: So We rescued him and his family - except for his wife. She was one of those who stayed behind.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: But We saved him and his family, except for his wife who was one of those who stayed behind.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Then We delivered Lot and his household save his wife who stayed behind,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We saved (Lot) and his family except his wife who remained with the rest.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And We rescued him and his family, except his wife – she became of those who stayed behind.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Then We saved him and his family, except his wife; she was of the Ghabirin (those who lagged behind).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: So We delivered him and his followers, except his wife; she was of those who remained behind.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: So We delivered him and his family, except his wife; she was one of those that tarried.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And We rescued him and his household, save his wife, who was of those who stayed behind.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: So We saved him and his family -- except for his wife. She was one of those who stayed behind.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then We delivered him and his household, save his wife: she was among the lingerers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Thereupon We delivered him and his family, except his wife; she was one of those who remained behind.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: But we saved him and his family, except his wife: she was of those who legged behind.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Then We saved him and his family, except his wife; she was of those who remained behind (in the torment).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: We saved him and all his family, except his wife, who was made to remain,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: But We saved him and his family, except for his wife; she was of those who lagged behind.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: So We saved him and his family, except for his wife; she was of those who remained [with the evildoers].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [7:83] So We delivered him and his family, except his wife: she was of those who stayed behind, who remained in the chastisement.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And We rescued him) i.e. Lot (and his household) his daughters: Za'ura and Raytha, (save his wife, who was of those who stayed behind) and was therefore destroyed.
